mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes) values (tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes} )
mapper.select:
select * from ( select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsStock, g.gdsDes, g.gdsDate, a.uuid, a.uploadpath, a.filename , rank () over(partition by g.gdsNum order by rownum) rk from tbl_goods g, goods_category c, tbl_attach a where g.cateCode = c.cateCode AND g.gdsNum = a.gdsNum
) where rk =1 order by gdsNum desc

select * from ( select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsStock, g.gdsDes, g.gdsDate, a.uuid, a.uploadpath, a.filename , rank () over(partition by g.gdsNum order by rownum) rk from tbl_goods g, goods_category c, tbl_attach a where g.cateCode = c.cateCode AND g.gdsNum = a.gdsNum
) where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
select orderId, memId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount, orderDate, delivery from tbl_order

select o.orderId, o.memId, o.orderRec, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.userAddr3, o.orderPhon, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.orderId = #{orderId}
select orderId, gdsNum, cartStock from tbl_order_details where orderId = #{orderId}
select r.gdsNum, r.memId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, m.memNickname from tbl_replydh r inner join tbl_member m on r.memId = m.memId
